projects.title: AMZ Geeks
projects.summary: Service platform enabling Amazon, Walmart, and Shopify operations with dashboard-based payment records.
projects.tech: React.js, Laravel, MySQL, Redux Toolkit, Stripe
projects.problem: Businesses needed a consolidated platform to manage marketplace services and payment tracking.
outcomes: Implemented frontend workflows with React.js and Redux Toolkit.
Connected backend APIs with MySQL data retrieval.

projects.title: Texas Center Wellness
projects.summary: Wellness and integrative medicine portal for therapies, appointments, and treatment personalization.
projects.problem: The client required a responsive healthcare portal to manage therapy programs and consultations.
outcomes: Built an interactive React.js frontend with stateful treatment workflows.
Developed REST APIs for appointments and therapy modules.
Structured MongoDB models for profile and treatment-preference data.

projects.title: Four Coaches
projects.summary: Role-based platform connecting athletes and coaches with profile approval workflows.
projects.tech: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Redux, Context API
projects.problem: The business needed a multi-role system with admin-driven profile lifecycle controls.
outcomes: Delivered role-based UX for admins, athletes, and coaches.
Integrated API flows with MongoDB-backed profiles.
Improved usability via Redux and Context-driven state architecture.

projects.title: Pepperoni Pizza
projects.summary: Online pizza ordering platform supporting customization and three user roles.
projects.problem: The client needed customizable product ordering with operational controls for multiple user roles.
outcomes: Implemented product customization and ordering flows.
Connected frontend actions with Laravel API endpoints.
Enabled scalable state handling with Redux Toolkit.

projects.title: Scottmiller
projects.summary: Book commerce platform with e-book dashboard and external print/payment integrations.
projects.tech: React.js, Laravel, Redux Toolkit, Lulu API, SquareUp
projects.problem: The store required unified purchase, print-on-demand, and digital content management.
outcomes: Built dashboard experiences for purchased e-books.
Integrated Lulu print-on-demand API for publishing workflows.
Integrated SquareUp for secure payment operations.

projects.title: Tuxedo Air Platform
projects.summary: Corporate aviation website showcasing services, operations, fleet data, and certifications.
projects.problem: The organization needed structured dynamic content with scalable admin management.
outcomes: Built reusable admin panels for services and fleet management.
Implemented responsive frontend pages using Blade and modern CSS.
Maintained clean MVC architecture for long-term scalability.
